Sentencas: This work investigated the mechanical and electrical properties of NiO-SDC/SDC anode sintered by two different methods: in a microwave at about 1200 degrees C for 1 h and in a conventional furnace at 1200 degrees C with a holding time of 1 h (total sintering time of 21 h).
Titulo: Characterization of IT-SOFC non-symmetrical anode sintered through conventional furnace and microwave

Sentencas: Nano-powders SM0.2Ce0.8O1.9 (SDC) and NiO were mixed using a high-energy ball mill, followed by the co-pressing technique at a compaction pressure of 400 MPa.
Titulo: Characterization of IT-SOFC non-symmetrical anode sintered through conventional furnace and microwave

Sentencas: No binder was used between the layers.
Titulo: Characterization of IT-SOFC non-symmetrical anode sintered through conventional furnace and microwave

Sentencas: The electrical behaviors of all sintered samples were studied using electrochemical impedance spectra in the frequency range of 0.01-10(5) Hz under 97% H-2-3% H2O, an amplitude of 10 mV, and at high temperature range of 600-800 degrees C. Results indicate that the non-symmetrical NiO-SDC/SDC anode achieved through microwave sintering has finer grain size and higher electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Characterization of IT-SOFC non-symmetrical anode sintered through conventional furnace and microwave

Sentencas: However, hardness and Young's modulus increased in the samples sintered through a conventional furnace.
Titulo: Characterization of IT-SOFC non-symmetrical anode sintered through conventional furnace and microwave
